name: IntroView
tagline: Simple intro / welcome view for iPad apps using UICollectionView and AutoLayout
body:
This example project shows how to implement a simple intro (welcome) view for an iPad app using [UICollectionView](http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/uikit/reference/UICollectionView_class/Reference/Reference.html) and [AutoLayout](https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AutolayoutPG/Articles/Introduction.html).

#### Portrait mode
![IntroView in Portrait Mode](http://i.imgur.com/KoMyear.png)

#### Landscape mode
![IntroView in Landscape Mode](http://i.imgur.com/fRGkVKq.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
